title: Considerations upon the reputation, loyalty, manners, & religion of Thomas Hobbes of Malmsbury written by himself, by way of letter to a learned person.
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
notes: In answer to: Hobbius Heuton-timorumenos, or a consideration of Mr. Hobbs his dialogues / John Wallis. 1662.
First published in 1662 with title: Mr. Hobbes considered in his loyalty, religion, reputation, and manners, by way of a letter to Dr. Wallis.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
